Key Match Events: Vietnam lost to Indonesia with a score of 0-1
Nguyen Filip made 2 good saves against Indonesian strikers
Nguyen Thanh Binh was awarded a penalty for a foul in the penalty area
Pre-Game Insights: Coach Philippe Troussier and his team were at the bottom of the group, no matter what the final match result is
Nguyen Quang Hai and his teammates could not rise to third place even with a strong victory against Iraq
Post-Match Reflections: Coach Shin Tae-yong said that Indonesia lost to Vietnam due to a skill gap
Coach Kim Sang-sik said that it's very difficult to win big against Indonesia
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was the first time the Vietnamese team has participated in the Asian Cup without making it past the group stage
The Vietnamese team played poorly in the first half and goalkeeper Nguyen Filip had to show off his talent to save the home team many times
Others: The Asian Cup 2023 rankings showed that Iraq was at the top with 6 points, followed by Japan with 3 points, Indonesia with 3 points, and Vietnam with 0 points
